files.patch: @@ -48,0 +48,11 @@ + /** + * Test writing a JPEG using a IndexColorModel + * + * @param imageType a Transparency constant (OPAQUE, BITMASK, TRANSLUCENT) that is used to + * define a new IndexColorModel. + * @param name the name of the Transparency constant + * @param expectedWriteReturnValue the expected return value of ImageIO.write(..) + * @return true if ImageIO.write(..) == expectedWriteReturnValue, or false otherwise. + * This also returns false if ImageIO.write(..) throws an exception. We do not + * expect that to happen anymore. (Prior to resolving 8351108 ImageIO threw an exception.) + */ @@ -75,1 +86,1 @@ - throw new Error("ImageIO.write(..) returned " + result + " but we expected " + expectedWriteReturnValue); + throw new Exception("ImageIO.write(..) returned " + result + " but we expected " + expectedWriteReturnValue);
